expo.name: Aura - Digital Fashion
expo.description: Discover, try on, and style designer fashion with AI-powered virtual try-on technology. Your digital fashion aura awaits.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to create your digital avatar for virtual try-on experiences.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to save and share your fashion looks.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may use the microphone for video content creation.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Aura to access your camera to create your digital avatar.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Aura to access your photos to save and share your fashion looks.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Aura to save photos to your device.
